info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 06 at 10:01PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CST FOR WARRICK AND NORTHERN SPENCER COUNTIES... At 901 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chandler, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Boonville around 905 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Folsomville, Dale and Santa Claus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 6 and 7. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 46 and 60. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
